<MethodEndpoint

>

Get a [Connection](https://docs.ganymede.bio/app/agents/Agent#installing-connections) in an Environment by its id.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"environment","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"id","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Connection","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"state":{"type":"string","enum":["Live","Updating","Disconnected","Shutdown","Deprecated"],"title":"ConnectionState"},"version":{"type":"string"},"startTime":{"type":"string"},"agentId":{"type":"string"},"environment":{"type":"string"},"tags":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string"},"type":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"string"}},"required":["id","type","value"],"title":"Tag"}},"labels":{"nullable":true,"description":"identifier metadata for a connection","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}},"required":["id","name","state","version","startTime","agentId","environment"],"title":"Connection"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
